alert.note: Alert for Butler (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 19 at 7:28PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Butler County through 800 PM CDT... At 728 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Potwin, or 10 miles east of Whitewater, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... El Dorado, Towanda, Potwin, El Dorado Airport, El Dorado Lake and El Dorado State Park. This includes Interstate 35 between Mile Markers 68 and 85. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
